thread.title: Trump to give commencement speech at Liberty University
thread.title_full: Trump to give commencement speech at Liberty University | New York Post

author: Daniel Halper
title: Trump to give commencement speech at Liberty University
text:
President Trump will deliver the commencement speech in May at Liberty University, a prominent evangelical Christian school in Virginia.
“I look forward to speaking to this amazing group of students on such a momentous occasion,” Trump told CBN, the Christian Broadcasting Network .
“Our children truly are the future and I look forward to celebrating the success of this graduating class as well as sharing lessons as they embark on their next chapter full of hope, faith, optimism, and a passion for life,” he added.
Liberty is run by Jerry Falwell Jr., who was a high-level surrogate for Trump during the presidential campaign.
Falwell’s support of the New York real estate mogul helped Trump make inroads with conservative Christian voters across the country.
“His supporters, including over 80 percent of the evangelical community, are thrilled with President Trump’s actions so far,” Falwell told CBN, praising the fairly new president.
“The fact that the mainstream media and the Establishment (on the left and the right) remain in attack mode with their often baseless and dishonest claims against Trump is a sign that President Trump is doing a wonderful job,” he added.
